Title: Establishes a task force to address policies related to the treatment of transgender, gender nonconforming, non-binary, and intersex individuals in custody
Summary: Establishes a task force to address policies related to the treatment of transgender, gender nonconforming, non-binary, and intersex individuals in the custody of the department of corrections and community supervision.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to establishing a task force to address policies related to the treatment of transgender, gender nonconforming, non-binary, and intersex individuals in custody
